And perhaps the debt crisis might be solved with more Jobs,...
...as in Steve Jobs, the CEO of Apple.
The latest earnings report from the world's most highly - valued tech company shows...
...cash reserves of more than 76 billion dollars.
The US Treasury has reserves just under 74 billion dollars.
These figures may not be directly comparable since Apple's number is based on its ready cash...
...while the US figure is how much it has before hitting the debt ceiling.
